titleStmt.title: The Dutch rogue, or, Gusman of Amsterdam traced from the craddle to the gallows being the life, rise, and fall of D. de Lebechea, a decay'd merchant : containing many fraudulent practises, notorious villanies, and audacious enterprizes, with their various events.
titleStmt.author: S. P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Greg. Hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
